title: Drawing, "Textile design: Large flower head motifs on black ground", 20th century
medium: Brush and yellow and black gouache on white paper.
description: Densely patterned flower heads in yellow and white with black and white dotted centers.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Textile design: Large flower head motifs on black ground", 20th century.
20th century. Brush and yellow and black gouache on white paper.. Gift of Max Wilner. 1942-87-4-a.
